article_title: NAACP and ACLU sue for release of Jamar Clark video

og.description: Plus: Dayton stopped airport from pursuing charges against BLM protesters; health insurance premium increases in Minnesota; pantsless man arrested in South Dakota; and more.
og.title: NAACP and ACLU sue for release of Jamar Clark video
